dialogs.npcText:
Thanks for your help child, I was getting bored stuck in my head. 
 *The gem, now lodged in their head glows with the words.*
That is correct, I was not tricking you. I needed somebody to get this gem to allow me to project my thoughts. Now I can talk, kinda.
dialogs.secondText: [2] Do I get that kiss now?

dialogs.npcText: Oh oh, drugs haven't worn off yet. I'm your aunt, I feel that would be inappropriate.
*She gives you a look and refuses to talk to you.*
